marklogic.body: Why would any of our elected officials care about the price we working people have to pay for utilities? They have millions of our dollars that they distribute to their friends who contribute to their campaigns. Pretty soon they government will give us an allowance based upon what they think we should spend in order to eat, and continue to live and pay taxes to them. They all need to be voted out. All those environmentalists who think that coal and other fuels except green fuels should be Banned, let them figure out what do in the Heat of the summer and the Cold in the winter in order to stay comfortable. They worry about the bears and foxes, and let the humans suffer.
